titleStmt.title: The Lords and Commons reasons and justifications for the deprivation and deposal of James II. from the imperial throne of England Being in full satisfaction to all the princes of Europe, and in answer to all objections, domestick and foraign. Allowed to be printed.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
